name: Ally in the land of GPL.
short_description:
This is a web based on line editor for PHP developers.

This project is Free Software in the meaning of freedom, because you are free to use and improve it, for more information find out "Free Software Foundation" a GPLv3 Licence.

The programming style (in both PHP and Javascript codes) is not unified; one of the targets is to rewrite some PHP and Javascript parts, but the first target is to reach a stable release with these features:

-A good, stable and easy install process (nobody has time to waste).
-Operations on folders and files (add/delete/save/autosave)
-Autocomplete methods for PHP classes
-One file per tab (multiple files opened)

Credits:
It integrates jsTree (http://www.jstree.com/) and CodeMirror (http://www.codemirror.net/)
For the icons:
http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Crystal_Clear_action_filenew.png
http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Gnome-folder.svg

Homepage: http://sourceforge.net/p/ally/blog/
summary: A web based on line editor for PHP developers.
